fr.lirmm.graphik.graal.api.forward_chaining

Interface ChaseHaltingCondition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChaseStopConditionWithHandler, CoreChaseStopCondition, FGHRuleChaseCondition, FrontierRestrictedChaseHaltingCondition, RestrictedChaseStopCondition

    public interface ChaseHaltingCondition
    The ChaseHaltingCondition interface provides a way to control when a saturation process will stop.
    Author:
    Cl√©ment Sipieter (INRIA)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GIterator<Atom> apply(Rule rule, Substitution substitution, AtomSet data)
      This method should return the atoms to actually add.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        GIterator<Atom> apply(Rule rule,
                    Substitution substitution,
                    AtomSet data)
                      throws HomomorphismFactoryException,
                             HomomorphismException
        This method should return the atoms to actually add.
        Parameters:
        rule - The rule which is triggered
        substitution - A homomorphism of the rule body found. The existential variables are not substitued.
        data - The data over which this rule is applied.
        Returns:
        A full substitution or null if the application is reduntant. The returned substitution should substitutes all variables of the head of the rule.
        Throws:
        HomomorphismFactoryException
        HomomorphismException
